U

updateDatabase(User) - Method in class accountsettings.AccountSettingsController
When this method is called, the USERINFO table's USERNAME, PASSWORD and EMAIL column will be updated.
user(User) - Method in class main.MainMenuDriveController
This method is used to be able to set the static field user in an instance method.
User - Class in users
This Class holds all the user info pulled from the USERINFO and SCHEDULEINFO table.
User(String, String, String, LocalDate, Time) - Constructor for class users.User
This constructor is used for passing the fields to the USERINFO table from main.MainMenuContoller class.
User(String, String, String, boolean, double) - Constructor for class users.User
This constructor is used for passing the fields to the USERINFO table from the newuser.NewUserController class.
User(int, String, String, String, boolean, double) - Constructor for class users.User
This constructor is used for passing the fields to the USERINFO table from the login.LoginController class.
User(String, double, String, String, LocalDate, Time) - Constructor for class users.User
This constructor is used for passing the fields to the SCHEDULEINFO table from the main.MainMenuDriveController and main.MainMenuRideController.
UserNameValidator - Class in newuser
Holds the reg ex (correct format) for the username field.
UserNameValidator() - Constructor for class newuser.UserNameValidator
creates a pattern type from the regex.
users - package users
 
userSelected(User) - Method in class main.MainMenuDriveController
This method creates the user type from the clicked field in the tableview.
